creditline: Bequest from the Norman and Brenda Canedy Collection
description: Recto: seated man at left points toward several figures on the right; figures at bottom in water reclining over a horse Verso: a study for the "Juno" figure, drawn in reverse on verso and traced on recto
medium: Recto: Pen, ink and wash over black chalk or charcoal on paper; Verso: black chalk or charcoal
title: 'Apple of Discord': Prologue to the Trojan Legends (recto); Study for the Figure of Juno (verso)
